label: ObservationResultCharacteristic
comment: Specifies the type of the performed observation and the acquired values of this observation on the sample.

datatypeProperties.comment: The rate of the applied dilution for this sample observation result characteristic.
A code specifying the operator, such as, less than, greater than or equal to, for comparing two actual measures.
The measured value, expressed as text, for this inspection result characteristic.
The identifier of the method parameter for this sample observation result characteristic.
The parameter value, expressed as text, for this sample observation result characteristic.
The code specifying the quality of the result for this inspection result characteristic.
A textual description of the quality of the result for this inspection result characteristic.
The range, expressed as text, of the values of the measurements performed for this inspection result characteristic.
The textual description of the reference level for the quality of the result for this sample observation result characteristic.
The indication of whether or not this sample observation result characteristic is shareable.

objectProperties.comment: An applicable objective observation parameter of the interpretation result for this inspection result characteristic.
Accuracy, expressed as a measure, of the measurement for this inspection result characteristic.
A measured value for this inspection result characteristic.

referencedBy.comment: An expected value for the characteristic, to be observed or measured according to the specified type of observation for this sample observation result.
A maximum standard value of the values for the characteristic observed or measured by using the specified type of observation for this sample observation result.
A minimum standard value of the values for the characteristic observed or measured by using the specified type of observation for this sample observation result.
An observed value for the characteristic, acquired by observing or measuring according to the specified type of observation for this sample observation result.
